title: Elusive Informant
gameText: Play this card to add or decrease by two any Team's BUREAUCRACY or ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check.
dialogue: "U.S. Government knew about the Black Cancer. They lied. Didn't have no cure… no inoculation… I think we'll quit right there. I got nothing more to say." - Terry E. Mayhew
createdBy: Alfredo Sánchez, Robert Czepiel, Greg Fremaux

title: Premonitory Nightmare
gameText: Play this card during the Briefing Phase. Place the card in the Field. During the Site investigation phase you may discard this card to add 2 to a Site skill check on any Team containing an Agent with the Keyword BELIEVER. Remove the card in any case at the end of your turn.
dialogue: "You're saying that you're out here because of something you saw in a dream?" - Scully

title: Whispers of Hearts
gameText: Play on one Agent to allow that Agent to use their EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill number for any one BEHAVIORAL or CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check.
dialogue: "She was strangled. He used an eight-gauge electrical cord. He took something from the body post-mortem… a trophy. A piece of fabric cut from her clothes… in the shape of a heart." - Mulder

title: Sacrificing Blast
gameText: Place this card on any opponent's Field with two tokens on it. Each time this opponent plays a [RP] card, they must discard one card from their hand (opponent's choice). Remove a token during your opponent's Briefing Phase. When all tokens have been removed, discard this card.
dialogue: Scully: "Mulder, get in the car, there's no time!"

title: FBI Reinforcement
gameText: Play this card during the Briefing Phase to select any Agent card from any player's Discard Pile and play it for half cost (rounded up). The chosen Agent cannot be similar to any of your Agents already in play, you must ignore the Game Effect and you must discard it at the end of this turn.
dialogue:
Pendrell: "Shouldn't we wait for Agent Scully? Just so I won't have to repeat myself."
Mulder: "She's not coming. She's got a date."
createdBy: Alfredo Sánchez, Robert Czepiel, Greg Fremaux

title: Doppelganger Agent
gameText: Play this card at the beginning of the Briefing Phase. Remove target Agent from play (Equipment and tokens included) and replace it with this card, representing a doppelganger with all skills reduced by one. Owner may use the Agent normally. At the end of the turn, discard this card and return the original Agent.
dialogue: "Who called the cops?" - Eddie Van Blundht
createdBy: Alfredo Sánchez, Robert Czepiel, Greg Fremaux

title: X's Demise Struggle
gameText: Place this card on your opponent's side. While this card is in play, your opponent cannot use cards nor Agent's Game Effects that allow them to draw cards (or search for cards) from the Bureau deck or from the Discard Pile. During your Briefing Phase pay 1 [CP] or discard this card.
dialogue: "I was warned by a man we both know… who I believe knows the truth…" - Scully

title: Home Call
gameText: Search through your Bureau deck for any one Site card with Keyword RESULT. Show the card to your opponent and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Bureau deck.
dialogue: "I'm Assistant Director Walter Skinner with the FBI. May we come in?." - Skinner

title: Tempus Fugit
gameText: Play this card during the Briefing Phase to force any opponent to skip the next Healing, Requisition and Deployment phases and go directly to the Case Assignment phase. Remove this card from the game. The effects of this card may not be negated.
dialogue: Mike Millar: "You're saying the man sitting in seat thirteen-F was abducted mid-flight without any depressurization of the cabin, without any effect on the plane…"
createdBy: Alfredo Sánchez, Robert Czepiel, Greg Fremaux

title: Christmas Retreat
gameText: You may take a second purchase of cards after your first one (during the Briefing Phase). Then, go directly to the Case Assignment phase. Remove this card from the game. The effects of this card cannot be negated.
dialogue: Melissa Scully: "You don't know who you're going to meet when you join the FBI. You don't know how your life is going to change or how you're going to change the life of others…"

title: Identity Swap
gameText: Play this card at the beginning of the Briefing Phase. You may exchange one of your Agents with any Agent controlled by your opponent, with the same or lower [RP] cost and in the same section of the table (including tokens and attached cards). Both players may use their new Agents as usual, except for their Game Effect. At the end of this turn exchange the Agents again in their final locations (sections).
dialogue: Mulder: "Scully! He's not me!"

title: Agents' Recharge
gameText: Play this card at the beginning of the Case Assignment or the Investigation phases to get an additional Healing phase this turn. After that extra phase, go directly to the Debriefing phase. Remove this card from the game.
dialogue: "I'm taking a bubble bath." - Skinner
createdBy: Alfredo Sánchez, Robert Czepiel, Greg Fremaux

title: Momentary Connection
gameText: Play this card on a Team including Agent Fox Mulder and Agent Dana Scully. Choose one of these Agents to use one of the other Agent's skills during a single skill check decreased by one (i.e. Scully could use Mulder's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill as 3). You can only have one of this card in your Bureau deck.
dialogue: "Ow! Something stung me." - Scully

title: Double Agent
gameText: Play this card at the end of the Briefing Phase to move any number of tokens from your [RP] pool to your [CP] pool or vice versa. Each player may only have one of this card in their deck. Remove this card from the game.
dialogue: "Keeping Fox Mulder down is not a job. It's your dirty work!" - Spender

title: The Devil's Choice
gameText: Discard the top card from both players' Bureau decks. If your card has higher cost than your opponent's, you may add 8 tokens to your [RP] pool (if you are the active player) or to the [CP] pool (if you are the Directed player). If lower, only empty your [RP] and [CP] pools, your opponent's pools remain unaffected.
dialogue: "Is this what you saw? It's a Seraphim. An angel, with four faces. Those of a man, a lion, an eagle, and a bull." - Father McCue

title: Hope vs Selfishness
gameText: Pay X [CP] to remove X [RP] from your opponent's pool immediately, or vice versa.
dialogue: "Find Agent Scully. Only then will you realize the scope and grandeur of the project. Go. Go now!" - Well-manicured Man

title: Deep Throat
gameText: Ask any one Characteristic question regarding one opponent's X-File. Remove this card from the game. The effects of this card may not be negated.
dialogue: "You've seen things that weren't to be seen. Care and discretion, are now imperative." - Deep Throat

title: X
gameText: Negate any one Keyword ADVERSARY card.
dialogue: "You failed. This is your success? Killing me? The truth is… you need me, Agent Mulder." - X

title: No One So Paranoid
gameText: Play this card to gain one of the following: Adds +1 to Computer skill, negates one Event, or discard one Bluff card from a site.
dialogue:
Byers: "Both of you relax!"
Langly: "Shut up, ya narc!"
Frohike: "It's your fault we're here."

title: Shared Secrets
gameText: Play this card any time after Diana Fowley's successfully investigates a Site with ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill in the same Team as Agent Fox Mulder. Place 3 additional tokens on Mulder's card. Remove this card from the game.
dialogue: "That's where it all begins. That's where we need to be if we want to survive it." - Mulder
createdBy: Alfredo Sánchez, Robert Czepiel, Greg Fremaux

title: Edge of the Unknown
gameText: Place this card next to your X-File. You may draw one card for free in each of your opponents' Briefing Phases. You may only have one of this card in play.
dialogue:
Mulder: "Scully, ya gotta see this! Scully!"
Scully: "I see it."

title: Alien DNA Drain
gameText: You may discard any number of cards from your hand to force your opponent to discard the same cards from their hand (opponent's choice).
dialogue: "You see, the alien fetus would give us the alien genome… the DNA with which we could make a human hybrid. A new race, Agent Mulder." - The Cigarette Smoking Man

title: Healing Regurgitation
gameText: Play this card to recover an Agent that was killed and removed from play, where X is the cost of that Agent. Remove this card from the game. Each player may have only one of this card in their deck.
dialogue: "The doctor says Mrs. Hangemuhl's kidneys have spontaneously healed. She's a healthy woman." - Doggett
createdBy: Alfredo Sánchez, Robert Czepiel, Greg Fremaux

title: Unearthly Harvest
gameText: Play this card to exchange both pools ([RP] and [CP]) with your opponent.
dialogue: "They're … they're taking her. They're … oh, my God." - Scully

title: Apology is Policy
gameText: Play this card to change a negative skill check modifier to a positive one (e.g., a -1 becomes a +1).
dialogue:
Scully: "Apology has become policy."
Mulder: "I don't need an apology for the lies."

title: Cross-team Support
gameText: Play this card to allow one Agent on a Team in the Field to add their skills to one skill check that is occurring in another Site in the Field being investigated by another Team. The Agent's skill is reduced by 1 (i.e., Skill: 2 becomes Skill: 1). LRC and CRC may not be added.
dialogue: "Monica? You're not gonna believe this. We found two more cases. Two more victims to add to this thing." - Doggett

title: Deceive, Inveigle, Obfuscate
gameText: Play this card to add or decrease by two any Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check.
dialogue: "I've never underestimated Mulder. I still don't." - The Cigarette-Smoking Man

title: We Are Not Alone
gameText: The next cards that you play on this site will have their cost increased by 1. Your opponents may not negate any of those cards this turn.
dialogue: "I knew why my life had been spared. That I was to deliver the message of these angels. These sons of god." - Zeke Josepho

title: Agent Monica Reyes at Death's Door
gameText: If your opponent includes Agent Monica Reyes in any skill check in the Field, the Agent is instantly killed and removed from the game. Your opponent may play the card Audrey Pauley to negate the effects of this card. Agent Monica Reyes takes no damage and Audrey Pauley is killed instead. Remove the Witness card from the game, whether it was already in play or not.
dialogue: "They all think you're dead" – Audrey Pauley
createdBy: Alfredo Sánchez, Robert Czepiel, Greg Fremaux

title: Frohike
gameText: This card will negate one Event card played on your Team.
dialogue: Let me at him! I'll kill him!

title: All Lies Lead to the Truth
gameText: Place this card in one of your opponents Fields. Your opponent must subtract 1 from the [CP] he generates each turn while this card is in his Field. Your opponent may pay 5 [CP] to force you to discard this card.
dialogue: "When I went to work for the FBI, I didn't know of my father's crimes. When I stood up to him, he shot me." - Jeffrey Spender

title: The Lone Gunman
gameText: Play this card to search through your Bureau Deck and draw one Keyword ACTIVE card that increases an Agent or Team skill check during the Investigation phase. Add the card to your hand and reveal it to your opponent. Shuffle your deck.
dialogue: "And began publishing a… what shall I call it… rag, called "The Lone Gunman."" - Morris

title: I Want to Believe
gameText: Play on one Agent to allow that Agent to use their EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill number for any one ALIEN INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.
dialogue:
Scully: "Oh! This came for you."
Mulder: "Thank you."

title: Everything Dies
gameText: Place this card in the Field. As long as this card is in play, any Agent whose HEALTH value is reduced to zero is instantly killed and removed from the game. If any player loses all their Agents, that player loses the game.
dialogue: "I can't truly believe I'm really standing here." - Scully

title: Dead Zone
gameText: Place this card in any Section of your opponent's side of the table. While this card is in play, no Agent in that Section may contribute their skills to skill checks in another Section of the table. The player controlling this Section may pay 4 [RP] to discard this card.
dialogue: "Before William was kidnapped, Byers was able to tuck a cell phone under the padding of the baby" – Scully

title: E pur si muove
gameText: Both players must discard their entire hands and draw seven cards from the top of their respective Bureau Decks.
dialogue: "From Space, it seems an abstraction --a magician's trick on a darkened stage. And from this distance one might never imagine that it is alive.." - Scully

title: Nothing Important Happened Today
gameText: Play this card to lower a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or EVIDENCE COLLECTION Site Prerequisite by 2.
dialogue: "Grab them Monica, we've got less than minute to get out of here." - Agent Doggett

title: Believe to Understand
gameText: Force an opponent Team investigating a Site to make a ALIEN INVESTIGATION 4+ skill check or the current player's turn ends immediately.
dialogue: "The map to our human genetic makeup every gene on every chromosome -- proof of what I've been saying. If only we could find more pieces." - Doctor Sandoz

title: Resist or Serve
gameText: Force an opponent Team investigating a Site to make a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check or the current player's turn ends immediately.
dialogue: "Talk to me, Scully! Sculllllllyyyyy! Dammit! Scully! Scully! Scully! Scully!" - Mulder

title: In the Big Inning
gameText: Play this card immediately after a Team of Agents has successfully investigated a Site and asked a Characteristic question regarding your X-File. If the question is answered with "yes", add 3 tokens to your [RP] pool.
dialogue: "…what you may find is you concentrate on hitting that little ball… The rest of the world just fades away-- all your everyday, nagging concerns." - Mulder

title: The Truth
gameText: Play this card after having successfully investigated a Site to ask an X-File's identity without incurring a penalty question. Remove this card from the game.
dialogue:
Byers: "Why risk perfect happiness, Mulder? Why risk your lives?"
Mulder: "Because I need to know the truth."
Byers: "You already know the truth."

title: The End
gameText: Play this card after answering "no" to a Characteristic Question regarding your X-File. Your opponent cannot ask about the same Characteristic for the next X turns, up to a maximum of three. X = [CP] cost paid.
dialogue: "We entrusted you. You failed." - Well-Manicured Man

title: Road Map
gameText: Attach this card to any Agent in the Field. Discard this card to return a Site card already investigated to your hand instead of discarding it.
dialogue:
Skinner: "What is it?"
Scully: "Santa Claus."
Mulder: "What?"
Scully: "Stop. Turn around."

title: Unclassified Reports
gameText: Attach this card to any Agent and put three cards from your Discard Pile under it. Any time during the game, you may discard one of the cards to gain a +1 modifier on one of the Keywords listed on that card. Discard this card when no cards remain under it.
dialogue: "That's your sister's file." - Scully

title: The African Artifact
gameText: Attach this card to an Agent with cost higher than three. Once you had successfully investigated a Site, you may remove this card and the Agent from play to ask an extra characteristic question regarding one opponent's X-File.
dialogue: "A genuine artifact, one of several pieces of an unknown whole…" - Mulder

title: Precision Sniper Riffle
gameText: Adds three to the Agent's LONG RANGE COMBAT skill once per combat.
dialogue: "Checkmate." - Gibson Praise

title: Social Worker Contact
gameText: Discard this card during the Investigation phase to search through your Discard Pile and add one Keyword RESOURCE card to your hand. Show the card to your opponents and shuffle your Discard Pile.
dialogue: "I'd like to interview your son Charlie, Mr. Holvey, but with a professional counsellor." - Scully

title: Emergency Quarantine
gameText: Place this card in the Field. You can avoid an attack of an Adversary played by your opponent by placing it under this card. It will attack on the next Site you play ignoring any activators. Discard this card afterwards.
dialogue: "I told her it was going to be a nice trip to the forest." - Mulder

title: Pheromone Bio-Sensor
gameText: Agents equipped with a Pheromone Bio-sensor may discard it to increase the cost of all Adversary cards played in a Site investigated by their Team by 2. This card must be discarded before the Adversary cards are played.
dialogue: Dr. Bronzino: "I'm getting a reading here. Trace levels inside the house…"

title: Security Pass
gameText: Discard this card to change the Site Prerequisite to ALIEN INVESTIGATION or BUREAUCRACY in a Site investigated by the Agent equipped with this card. Keywords of the Site card are also changed
dialogue: Security Guard: "Proceed down the hallway, please."

title: FBI Ballistics Lab
gameText: Place this Equipment card in the Bureau section. Once per turn, any Agent in the Bureau may add their COMPUTER or CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skills to any skill check done by any Team in the Field.
dialogue: Skinner: "9mm slug. Found it in the alley lodged in the wall. Most likely from the Sig Sauer P226 or 228."

title: Telemedicine Tools
gameText: Place this Equipment card in your Hospital section. During your Healing phase, you may place one Keyword MEDICAL or SCIENCES ACTIVE card under this card, face down. During your Investigation phase, you may play one of these cards for 2 [RP] less. No more than 2 cards may be under this card.
dialogue: Doggett: "Help me out here, Agent Scully."

title: Portable Radio
gameText: Attach this card to any Agent in the Field. Discard this card when that Agent is investigating a Site and is forced to go back to the Bureau to allow that Agent to contribute their skills to any skill check made by their Team this turn.
dialogue: Mulder: "Can I borrow your radio Mr. Sachs?"

title: ChemElement Analyzer
gameText: Agents equipped with a ChemElement Analyzer have access to the field office crime lab. Adds 1 to the Agent's SCIENCES and SUBTERFUGE skills.
dialogue: "Sample analysis is showing carbon, bromide, boron and calcium." - Scully

title: Satellite Navigator
gameText: Place 2 tokens on this card. Discard a token to look through your Bureau deck to draw any Site that asks a MOTIVE or METHOD question. Add it to your hand and reshuffle your Bureau deck. When no tokens remain, move this card to the Discard Pile.
dialogue: Mulder: "I'm going to get you out of there."

title: Handheld Digital Recorder
gameText: Adds 1 to the Agent's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill.
dialogue: "Okay. 6:01 p.m., February 24. Agents Scully and Mulder in the former home of David and Nancy Kline who disappeared without a trace last July." - Scully

title: Scuba Suit
gameText: Once per turn, the Scuba Suit adds 2 to the Agent's OBSERVATION or SUBTERFUGE skills during any skill check on any Site card related to a coastal state or country, or mentioning the words: 'Lake', 'River' or 'Sea'.
dialogue: Mulder: "Once, I, uh... I got a quarter off of the deep end at the "Y" pool."

title: Otoscope
gameText: Adds 1 to the Agent's OBSERVATION skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill.
dialogue: Scully: "Look, I have no idea what killed this woman but I have to assume it's communicable."

title: Forward-Looking InfraRed (FLIR)
gameText: Adds 1 to the Agent's OBSERVATION skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to skip a LRC round against a PRIMORDIAL or EVOLUTIONARY Adversary attacking the Team of an Agent equipped with a FLIR.
dialogue: Jeff: "Detects body heat at 300 yards."

title: High Focus Camera
gameText: Adds 1 to the Agent's OBSERVATION skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's BEHAVIORAL skill.
dialogue: "I thought we might at least allow ourselves to reminisce." - Cigarette Smoking Man

title: Biohazard Protection Suit
gameText: Adds 1 to the Agent's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill. Agents equipped with this card are not affected by ALIEN MANIPULATION cards. Additionally, you can discard this card to add one to the Agent's SCIENCES skill.
dialogue: "It looks like a nest... some type of black vermiform organism attached to the pineal gland..." - Scully

title: Specimen Vessels
gameText: Adds 1 to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill.
dialogue: "I think I located what you're looking for. It's a small miracle I found it, actually." - Dr. Kayser

title: Forensic Collection Kit
gameText: Adds 1 to the Agent's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's BEHAVIORAL skill.
dialogue: "This substance.. Did you find it anywhere else in the car?"- Mulder

title: Midnight Inquisitor
gameText: Discard this card to draw three cards from your Bureau deck during the requisition phase.
dialogue: “Just give me my lotto ticket and, uh, a pint of malt scotch whiskey." - Clyde Bruckman

title: Head X-Ray Plate
gameText: Adds 1 to the Agent's MEDICAL skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill.
dialogue: "It looks like a computer chip." - Scully

title: Forensic Face Lab
gameText: Adds 1 to the Agent's COMPUTER skill. Additionally,you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill.
dialogue: "You know how an airbag works?" - Pendrell

title: Face Mask
gameText: Adds two to the Agent's HEALTH.
dialogue: "The parasite is undetectable in the bloodstream. This is the only way to test whether or not you've been infected." - Osbourne

title: Bio-medical Division Card
gameText: Discard this card to change the Site Prerequisite to MEDICAL or SUBTERFUGE in a Site investigated by the Agent equipped with this card. Keywords of the Site card are also changed.
dialogue: "It's the tip of the iceberg. You and Mulder are the only ones who can bring it to light." - Deep Throat

title: Ofthalmoscope
gameText: Adds 1 to the Agent's MEDICAL skill. Additionally, you can discard this card to add two to the Agent's SCIENCES skill.
dialogue: "I'm going to give you a tetanus booster just as a precaution."- Doctor Zenzola

title: Emergency Admission
gameText: Place this card in the Hospital. Once per turn, during the Healing phase, you can remove from play a card from your hand to heal one point of damage to an Agent in the Hospital.
dialogue: "Blood pressure is 67 on palpatation." - Nurse

title: Ellen Adderly
gameText: The chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in the Combat. This card is free and Activator requirements are ignored if it is played on a Keyword OCCULT INVESTIGATION Site.
dialogue: "Then what? My marriage, my life… everything I thought I had… is nothing. It's all lies. I wish you'd never come here." - Ellen Adderly

title: Janke Dacyshyn
gameText: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. Dacyshyn engages one opposing Agent (your choice) in Combat. If Dacyshyn reduces the Agent to zero HEALTH, place this card on top of the Agent along with 3 tokens. Remove one token during each Briefing Phase. When no tokens are on the Agent, move the Agent to the Hospital including the damage tokens. This card is considered an ABDUCTION card.
dialogue: "I'm transporting vital organ." - Janke Dacyshyn

title: Blinding Predator
gameText: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. Target Agent (your choice) in the Team attacked by the Blinding Predator receives a poisonous attack and is considered "blinded" for the first CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round. That Agent will deal no damage during that round of combat.
dialogue: "Whatever happened to Sacks, I think it's happening to me. I'm completely blind now." - Leyla Harrison

title: The Bat Thing
gameText: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. This card may be played in its normal way or on any Team that includes at least one Agent with the keyword SKEPTIC, ignoring Activator requirements. The Bat Thing may use SUBTERFUGE Combat cards.
dialogue: "Today, he might have been fine but this thing hunts like a bat. It only attacks at night." - Ernie Stefaniuk

title: Schlugg's Cult
gameText: Attach this card to any Agent in a Team. Place five tokens on this card (three if the Team has any Agent with MEDICAL skill). The Agent must remain in the Field and cannot contribute to any Skill check until all tokens have been removed. Remove one token during each Active player's Debriefing Phase. Discard this card when the last token is removed. The Agent remains in the Field. Schlugg's Cult does not initiate Combat.
dialogue: "No! Ahhh!!! You son of a bitch!" - Scully

title: Ronnie Strickland
gameText: Only Agents with the Keyword BELIEVER may cause damage to Ronnie Strickland. If at any time during the Combat the Team attacked by Ronnie Strickland contains no Agents with the Keyword BELIEVER,the Combat ends immediately.
dialogue: "Oh, man! What'd you have to go and do that for? You are in big trouble." - Ronnie Strickland

title: Animated Snakes
gameText: Play this card for 2 [CP] less if played on a Site card with the Keyword OCCULT INVESTIGATION.
dialogue: Scully: "..Maybe it's symbolic. I mean, serpents and religion have gone hand in hand. They've represented the temptation of Eve -- Original Sin. They've been feared and hated throughout history as they've been thought to embody Satan -- to serve Evil itself".

title: Lasioderma Serricorne Outbreak
gameText: This card does not initiate Combat. Place target Agent under this card. The Agent may not contribute to any skill check this turn nor generate RES while under this card. At the beginning of your opponent's next Healing phase, remove this card from the game and send the Agent to the Hospital with two damage tokens.
dialogue: Scully: "...it could be some form of contagious agent, like an insect-borne bacterium..."

title: Whanshang Dole
gameText: Wanshang Dhole deals damage to its opponents first during each CRC round. If the HEALTH value of any opponent reaches zero after applying modifiers or healing cards,that combatant is sent to the Hospital and cannot deliver any damage back that round.
dialogue: "Hey, Buck. What's wrong, Buck?" - Dr James Riley

title: Faceless Alien Rebel
gameText: At the start of each Combat round you may play one Combat card from your Discard Pile (at normal cost). Remove from the game each Combat card played this way. Subtract one from all damage sources applied to this Adversary during the LRC round.
dialogue: "Plans that would have worked had not a rebel alien race come to destroy them." - The Cigarette Smoking Man
createdBy: Alfredo Sánchez, Robert Czepiel, Greg Fremaux

title: Maitreya's Virtual Menace
gameText: Maitreya may use MARTIAL ARTS Combat cards. The damage dealt by her on any Agent can be considered "virtual": the Agents' controller may remove 1 point of damage (1 token) from any Agent damaged by Maitreya for each 2 [RP]'s spent on that Agent. This action may prevent those Agents to be sent to the Hospital.
dialogue: Scully: "She's input herself into the game. We have to download her."

title: Aquatic Nightmare
dialogue: Scully: "I don't think these wounds are bites or stings. There's something in here, Mulder, right under the skin."

title: Kill Switch
gameText: This card does not initiate Combat. The Kill Switch creates a distorted reality on the Team of Agents and deals a total of 5 points of damage that may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice). Subtract the COMPUTER skill of each chosen Agent from the damage delivered by the Kill Switch to that Agent.
dialogue: "What's that smell? Oh, jeez!" - Mulder

title: Alien Spider Host
gameText: Attach the Alien Spider to an Agent in a Team of two or more Agents. That Agent becomes aggressive and attacks their own Team sequentially, one by one (your choice). Then the infected Agent moves on to the next Agent, until all Agents are defeated or until he is sent to the Hospital. Discard this card afterwards.
dialogue: "I'm dead, too, inside, because of this thing they put in me. For what? To turn me into some kind of killing machine, or just to see what would happen?" - Edward Skur

title: Karin's Dark Sorcery
gameText: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. For each Agent that Karin's Dark Sorcery sends to the Hospital you may remove up to 4 [RP] from your opponent's Resource Pool.
dialogue: Mulder: "Make him stop, Karin!  Tell him what you should have told him twenty years ago. You're not going to take it anymore."

title: Mothman's Lair
gameText: The Mothman is negated if the Team it attacks makes a successful SUBTERFUGE +4 skill check. The LRC round is skipped. For the first round of CRC, the chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in the Combat. The Mothman may use SUBTERFUGE cards.
dialogue: Mulder: "Witnesses described them as primitive looking men with red piercing eyes. Became known as the "moth men." I've got an X-File dating back to 1952 on it."

title: Demonic Puppet
gameText: The Demonic Puppet initiates Combat but does not assign nor receive any damage. Instead, the selected Agent in a Team inflicts a wound upon himself or herself equal to the sum of their LRC & CRC values, applied only once. Healing cards may be used to prevent damage, including any Combat cards that do not modify LRC and/or CRC.
dialogue: Scully: "Give me the doll, Polly."

title: Wetwired
gameText: Play on an Agent in a Team of 2 or more Agents. That Agent initiates Combat against another Agent in the Team (your choice). Follow usual Combat rules until any of the Agents' HEALTH is reduced to zero. The Combat ends and that Agent (or both) must go to the Hospital. The remaining Team may still contribute to the Site skill check as usual.
dialogue: Langly: "This device is stimulating electrical activity in the brain."

title: Cult Carnage
gameText: Play this card on a Team in the Field that plays a Witness during the Investigation phase. The Witness card is discarded. Instead, that Witness joins the Temple of the Seven Stars and will attack one of the Agents in that Team (your choice) only during an LRC round.
dialogue: "I knew you were coming. I've known for nine centuries. It was written in the Revelation of Jesus Christ...." - Vernon Ephesian

title: The Twins Poisonous Attack
gameText: This card does not initiate combat. The Team must make an OBSERVATION 5+ skill check. If unsuccessful, choose one Agent in the Team. That Agent receives 4 points of damage but can still contribute with his skills if HEALTH rating has not been reduced to 0. Healing cards can be played to avoid the damage.
dialogue: "We didn't drink enough to make us sick." - Scully

title: Fetishist Women Hunter
gameText: This card can only be played on a female Agent in a Team investigating a Site.
dialogue: "Some people collect salt and pepper shakers. The fetishist collects dead things. Hair, fingernails... no one quite knows why, though I've never quite understood salt and pepper shakers myself." - Mulder

title: Subliminal Assault
gameText: Play this card on a Team of two or more Agents. Choose an Agent at random and attach this card to that Agent. The Agent engages in Combat against the rest of Agents on the Team. You control the Agent as an Adversary until the Combat ends. Discard this card afterwards.
dialogue: "Mulder: Are you familiar with subliminal messages?"

title: The Walk
gameText: Subtract one from all damage sources applied to this Adversary.
dialogue: "I know a lot of crips have the same dream. The Walk. In my dream, I rise up, out of my chair, and I can stand. I look down the hallway, I'm not in the ward anymore, I'm home. With my baby girl." - Amputee

title: Visions of a Shaman
gameText: Pick the top three cards of your Bureau deck. Use the cost of the first one for the Shaman's LRC skill, the cost of the second as CRC, and the last one as HEALTH value (draw additional cards if needed if the cost of any of those cards is not a specific number). Shuffle your Bureau afterwards (including the drawn cards).
dialogue: "...there are powers that should not be disturbed... That some things are better left buried." - Mulder

title: Chung's Cosmic Goliath
gameText: This card does not initiate Combat. Pick one Agent from an investigating Team. That Agent remains "confused" until end of turn and cannot contribute his or her skills to any Site skill check.
dialogue: "Jack... what is that thing?" - Alien

title: The Grey-Haired Man
gameText: Reduce each Agent's LRC to 1. If target Team has more than one Agent, Your opponent may select one of those Agents not to participate in the Combat. If no Agent is chosen, then an additional LRC round will be played until your opponent selects an Agent to skip the Combat.
dialogue: "I've suffered some very personal... losses recently, and... I was... I was hoping…" - Mulder
createdBy: Greg Fremaux, Alfredo Sánchez, Robert Czepiel

title: George and Sherman Peacock's attack
gameText: If any Agent on target Team has an Equipment card attached that increases LRC skill you can attach that card to Peacock's brothers instead (only during the LONG RANGE COMBAT round and only one Equipment card, your choice). Discard that Equipment card if the chosen Agent is sent to the Hospital.
dialogue: "Where's the other brother... Edmund? " - Mulder

title: Vassily Peskow
gameText: The chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in the Combat. This card cannot be played over Agent Alex Krycek. Vassily Peskow can use SUBTERFUGE cards.
dialogue: "I am only here, Comrade, to congratulate you on a fine job." - Krycek

title: Knowle Rohrer
gameText: Knowle Rohrer regenerates (heals) one point of HEALTH at the beginning of each combat round as long as his HEALTH is not at zero.
dialogue: "Shoot me, Agent Doggett, if you think it'll make a difference this time." - Knowle Rohrer

title: The Siddhi Mystic's Curse
gameText: Draw a number of cards from your Bureau deck equal to the number of Agents on target team. Use the cost value of each drawn card to assign damage to any Agent in that team (your choice) as separated LRC attacks. Draw enough cards until you have numerical values to assign the damage. Shuffle the deck (including the drawn cards.
dialogue: "The Siddhi are a very mysterious and particularly powerful order of Fakirs." - C. Burks

title: Erwin Lukesh
gameText: Play this card on a team of Agents. The Agents in that team cannot deliver any damage to Erwin Lukesh during the LONG RANGE COMBAT round unless they have OBSERVATION or SUBTERFUGE skills. Erwin Lukesh may use SUBTERFUGE cards.
dialogue: "God, I enjoyed it.  You bled just like a pig" - Erwin Lukesh

title: Van Allen's Revenge
gameText: Once the Combat had ended, you can pay 2 [CP] to return Van Allen's Revenge to your hand. Your opponent may pay 3 [RP] to interrupt this effect.
dialogue: "Don't feel sorry. You going to hell just like I am, brother." - Ed Kelso

title: Rob Roberts, the Voracious Predator
gameText: At the beginning of each Combat round you may choose one Agent and reduce that Agent's HEALTH by 2. If the Agent's HEALTH is reduced to 0 by the end of that round, Rob Roberts also heals 2 points of HEALTH during that round.
dialogue: "What look like tool marks to you look to me like something more organic. Like it was made by a... a tongue or a proboscis." - Scully

title: Lord of the Flies
gameText: At the beginning of each combat round, you may choose one Agent. That Agent is webbed and cannot attack or use abilities that round. If that Agent's HEALTH is reduced to 0 by the end of the Combat, you may draw one extra card at the start of your next Briefing Phase.
dialogue: "Your mouth, your tongue... there's something wrong with you." - Natalie Gordon

title: Jinn's Twisted Wish
gameText: This card does not initiate combat. Place this card face up in your opponent's Bureau deck and reshuffle the deck. When this card reaches the top of the deck, your opponent's turn as Active player ends immediately. This card has no effect if it reaches the top of the deck during your opponent's turn as Directed player.
dialogue: "I wish for peace on earth." - Mulder

title: Sect Leader Anthony Tipet
gameText: You may play this card in its normal way, or use it to immediately end combat and control one Agent (your choice). Move the Agent to any section of the table. The Agent must remain in that section. Attach this card to the chosen Agent as a reminder. Discard this card during your opponent's next Investigation phase.
dialogue: "If we have the courage to see into darkness we see into God... free of the clay which confines us." - Anthony Tipet

title: Caballero, Memory Vampire
gameText: This card does not initiate combat. Play this card in your Field section. Place two tokens on this card. Discard a token anytime to look at the top three cards of your opponent's Bureau deck or to avoid an Agent to heal damage tokens during the Healing phase. When no tokens remain, move this card to the discard pile.
dialogue: "¿Dónde está el americano ahorita?" - Caballero

title: Lulu Pfeiffer
gameText: This You may search your Bureau deck for the "Betty Templeton" Adversary card and play it immediately, ignoring Activator requirements. If you do, both Adversaries attack simultaneously (treat as one Combat). Double both cards' CRC and HEALTH, and skip the LONG RANGE COMBAT round.
dialogue: "What are you doing here?" - Lulu Pfeiffer

title: Betty Templeton
gameText: This You may search your Bureau deck for the "Lulu Pfeiffer" Adversary card and play it immediately, ignoring Activator requirements. If you do, both Adversaries attack simultaneously (treat as one Combat). Double both cards' CRC and HEALTH, and skip the LONG RANGE COMBAT round.
dialogue: "What are you doing here?" - Betty Templeton

title: Ray Pearce, Metal Fury
gameText: LONG RANGE COMBAT attacks cause only half damage (rounded up) to Ray Pearce.
dialogue: "I've reviewed Ray's medical records from the VA. What his wife was calling Gulf War Syndrome is nothing of the kind. His entire cellular makeup was affected by exposure to some non-identifiable contaminant-- a metal." - Scully

title: Briefed on Secrets
gameText: Discard an Equipment card in play (your choice).
dialogue: "I'm starting to get used to the dark." - Skinner

title: FBI Safe House, Annandale, Virginia
question: You may ask on METHOD or one RESULT question. Cost of Adversary cards played on this Site is increased by 2.
dialogue: "She was waving it under our nose, she was playing with us. Modell told me, he warned me not to play the game. I think it was her game he was talking about." - Mulder

title: Samantha's Diary
gameText: Discard Samantha's Diary to return one card from your hand to the Bureau deck, then shuffle the deck. At the beginning of your next Briefing Phase, you may draw two additional cards.
dialogue: Scully: "It's a diary. It's your sister's."

title: Senior Director Carter
gameEffect: Place one token on Director Carter. Discard a token to remove one Agent from any Team you control and send them to the Bureau. If in combat, the Agent takes no damage and contributes no skills.
bio: Senior Director Carter is a high-ranking FBI official who interrogates Agent Dana Scully in Skinner's office regarding Agent Mulder's erratic behavior. He represents the bureaucratic concerns of the FBI as Mulder's investigations draw increasing scrutiny and institutional pressure.

title: The Elder's Call
gameText: Put two tokens on this card. You can use a token to keep at your side a non-resource Witness card or a Site for an additional turn. Remove a token each time you use this ability. You can use both in the same turn. Remove this card from the game once all the tokens have been removed.
dialogue: "Mister Mulder, I have someone here who'd like to speak with you." - First Elder

title: Piękny Umysł
gameText: Zagraj te karte aby zobaczyc 3 karty z gory swojej talii Biura. Nastepnie mozesz umiescic je z powrotem w dowolnej kolejnosci.
dialogue: "Skad wiesz co zamierza zrobic twoj przeciwnik? Dostajesz sie do jego glowy, czytasz jego mysli." - Mulder

title: A Privileged Mind
gameText: Play this card to look at the top three cards of your Bureau deck. Then, you may place them back in any order.
dialogue: "How you know what your opponent's going to do? You get inside his head. You read his thoughts." - Mulder

title: Pinker Rawls
gameText: LONG RANGE COMBAT attacks cause only half damage (rounded up) to Pinker Rawls.
dialogue: "Trevor what?" - Pinker Rawls

title: Unstoppable Ally
gameText: Play this card during a Close Range Combat round to search your Bureau Deck for any one card with the keyword COMBAT. Reveal the card to your opponent and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Bureau deck. If the card is immediately playable, You may do so for zero cost.
dialogue: "You didn't trust me." - Shannon McMahon

title: Messages From Beyond
gameText: Play this card to draw four cards, then place any two cards from your hand on top of your Bureau deck or in your discard pile.
dialogue: "Close your eyes and let them come to you. They will come to you if you're ready to see." - Harold Piller

title: Agent Kallenbrunner
gameEffect: Place one token on Agent Kallenbrunner. Discard this token to negate a Witness card played by your opponent. This token cannot be replaced.
bio: A key prosecutor on Mulder's trial, Agent Kallenbrunner is a prominent figure within the Syndicate. He is skeptical of alien conspiracies and uses harsh tactics to discredit witnesses like Scully or Spender. His role reflects his commitment to upholding the government's cover-up and suppressing the truth'.

title: The Toothpick Man
gameText: Play this card to negate one Witness card played by your opponent. Each player may only have one of this card in their deck. Remove this card from the game.
dialogue: "He is not human." - Gibson Praise

title: In Deep Shadows
gameText: Play this card to negate search through your Bureau Deck and add one of the following cards to your hand: The End, Second's Elder Deliberation, Covering Up Evidence, or the Toothpick Man. If you play the chosen card immediately, you may do so at half cost (rounded up). Alternatively, you can use this card to negate the effect of William.
dialogue: "Your son has to die." - Robert Comer

title: Billy Miles, Resurrected
gameText: This card does not initiate combat. Move up to two Agents in the Team investigating this site (your choice) to the Hospital with zero HEALTH. The Agent(s) may not leave the Hospital until fully healed. Combat cards cannot be used against this Adversary.
dialogue: "Billy Miles? He did this?" - Scully

title: The Overcoat Woman
gameText: Force your opponent to reveal their hand. Select one [CP] card. You may either play the selected card immediately (at its normal cost) or send it directly to its owner's Discard Pile. If played, the card is discarded afterwards.
dialogue: "Yes, he is safe. We're here." - The Overcoat Woman

title: Lone No More
gameText: Negate one of these cards (your choice): 'Byers', 'Frohike', 'Langly', 'Call on us more often', 'No one so paranoid', 'Three words, one solution', 'The Lone Gunman', 'The Lone Gunmen' or 'Three of a kind'.
dialogue: "They meant so much to me. I'm not sure if they really knew." - Scully
